document.heading: DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA GOVERNMENT ANNUAL LEAVE BANK AMENDMENT ACT OF 1990

history.narrative: Law 8-155 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 8-109, which was referred to the Committee on Government Operations. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on May 15, 1990, and May 29, 1990, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on June 18, 1990, it was assigned Act No. 8-217 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
